TEXT.TITLE: HOG AND CATTLE SLAUGHTER GUESSTIMATES
TEXT.BODY: Chicago Mercantile Exchange floor traders and commission house representatives are guesstimating today's hog slaughter at about 290,000 to 310,000 head versus 309,000 week ago and 328,000 a year ago. Cattle slaughter is guesstimated at about 128,000 to 131,000 head versus 129,000 week ago and 127,000 a year ago. Reuter
